TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CodeGroup extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit CodeGroup extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示抽象基类，必须从该基类中导出代码组的所有实现。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which all implementations of code groups must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代码组是代码访问安全策略的构建基块。Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy. 每个策略级别都包含一个可以具有子代码组的根代码组。Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have child code groups. 每个子代码组都可以有自己的子代码组;此行为将扩展为任意数目的级别，从而形成一个树。Each child code group can have their own child code groups; this behavior extends to any number of levels, forming a tree. 每个代码组都有一个成员条件，确定给定程序集是否属于该程序集的证据。Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to it based on the evidence for that assembly. 将仅应用其成员条件与给定程序集证据匹配的代码组。Only those code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly's evidence will be applied. 如果一个匹配的代码组具有子代码组，则同样会应用其成员条件与所提供的证据匹配的那些子级。If a matching code group has child code groups, then those children whose membership conditions also match the supplied evidence will likewise be applied.

span.span: A membership condition that tests evidence to determine whether this code group applies policy.

param.name: policy
param.span: 形式为权限集和特性的代码组的策略声明，这些权限集和特性将被授予匹配成员条件的代码。

span.span: The policy statement for the code group in the form of a permission set and attributes to grant code that matches the membership condition.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将创建一个基本代码组，并应从自定义代码组的构造函数中调用。This constructor creates a basic code group and should be called from the constructors of custom code groups. 您可以使用方法添加子代码组 。You can add child code groups using the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置代码组的子代码组的排序列表。

span.span: Gets or sets an ordered list of the child code groups of a code group.
A list of child code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于某些代码组，子代码组的顺序非常重要。The order of child code groups is significant for certain code groups. > [!NOTE] > 返回值是子代码列表的副本。The return value is a copy of the child code list. 不要使用返回的列表添加子代码组;请改用 方法。Do not use the returned list to add a child code group; instead, use the method.

span.span: An equivalent copy of the current code group, including its membership conditions and child code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会创建代码组的深层副本，因此还会生成代码组包含的所有对象的副本。This method makes a deep copy of the code group, so that copies of all objects the code group contains are also made.

summary.span: 获取或设置与该代码组关联的策略声明。

span.span: Gets or sets the policy statement associated with the code group.
The policy statement for the code group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当证据与成员资格条件匹配时，策略语句应用于程序集中的代码。The policy statement applies to code in assemblies when evidence matches the membership condition. 还可以通过向构造函数传递策略语句来设置此属性。This property can also be set by passing a policy statement to the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例 为代码组设置。The following example sets the for a code group. [!code-cpp[Classic CodeGroup.PolicyStatement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic CodeGroup.PolicyStatement Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CodeGroup.PolicyStatement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic CodeGroup.PolicyStatement Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CodeGroup.PolicyStatement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic CodeGroup.PolicyStatement Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Resolve (evidence As Evidence) As PolicyStatement

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，解析证据集的代码组及其子代的策略。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

returns.span: 由具有可选特性的代码组授予的权限组成的策略声明；或者，如果代码组不适用（成员条件与指定的证据不匹配），则为 。

span.span: A policy statement that consists of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 给定要加载的程序集的证据后，此方法将通过检查针对指定证据的成员条件来计算代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果存在匹配项，则此方法返回代码组的策略声明，包括子代码组的计算。If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups. 对于 ，还会解析其成员条件与指定证据相匹配的所有子代码组，并将所有生成的策略语句与父联合代码组的策略声明组合在一起。For a , all child code groups whose membership condition match the specified evidence are also resolved, and all resulting policy statements are combined with the policy statement of the parent union code group. 每个子代码组类型确定如何应用其下的所有子组，具体取决于 这些子组的方法的工作方式。Each child code group type determines how all child groups under it are applied, depending on how the methods of these child groups work. .NET Framework 安全系统将 在策略级别上使用，以确定要从生成的策略语句和程序集上的代码请求中授予加载的代码的权限。The .NET Framework security system uses on the policy levels to determine which permissions to grant to loaded code from the resulting policy statements and the code request on the assembly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ResolveMatchingCodeGroups (evidence As Evidence) As CodeGroup

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，解析匹配的代码组。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, resolves matching code groups.

returns.span: 一个 ，它是匹配代码组的树的根。

span.span: A that is the root of the tree of matching code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的计算特征与相同 。This method has the same evaluation characteristics as . 返回的代码组包含子代码组，这些子代码组反过来也可以有必要的子代码组，以反映与所提供的证据相匹配的完整代码组集。The code group that is returned contains child code groups, which in turn can have child code groups as necessary to reflect the complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence provided.
